template.name: gdlXLint
template.description: adding this to root gradle file - recompile with -Xlint:deprecation

template.name: gdlExtension
template.value: //Usege $rootProject.ext.appcompat ext { retrofit_version = '2.3.0' retrofit_okhttp_version = '3.10.0' android_compile_version = 25 android_version = '25.0.3' // Google Play Services minimum requirements is 14 android_min_sdk_version = 16 appcompat = '1.1.0-alpha01' constraintlayout = '1.0.0' material = '1.0.0' recyclerview = '1.0.0' cardview = '1.0.0' appcompat_library_version = '28.+' support_library_version = '25.3.1' gms_library_version = '15.0.1' gms_play_library_version = '15.0.0' fbs_library_version_ads = '18.0.0' fbs_library_version_config = '17.0.0' fbs_core_library_version = '16.0.3' fbs_message_library_version = '17.3.0' fbs_auth_library_version = '18.0.0' play_services_auth = '17.0.0' config_version = '2.1-alpha07' firebase_crashlytics_version = '2.10.1' adssdkmaster_version = '1.0.3' loginmaster_version = '2.0' }
template.description: create extension list under root gradle file

template.name: gdlJitpackImport
template.description: import jitpack mavan repository url under allProjects in root gradle file

template.name: gdlJitpackAuthToken
template.description: Jitpack auth token adding in gradle.properties file

template.name: gdlKeySigningConfig
gdlKeyBuildType
template.description: adding code under buildTypes -> release section

template.name: gdlCompileOptions
gdlEnablePSVM
template.description: Add the following line before </GradleProjectSettings/> path//.idea/gradle.xml

template.name: gdlDependencyAndroid
template.value: ext { appcompat = '1.3.0' material = '1.3.0' recyclerview = '1.1.0' cardview = '1.0.0' } implementation "androidx.appcompat:appcompat:$rootProject.ext.appcompat" implementation "com.google.android.material:material:$rootProject.ext.material" implementation "androidx.recyclerview:recyclerview:$rootProject.ext.recyclerview" implementation "androidx.cardview:cardview:$rootProject.ext.cardview"
template.description: implement basic like appcompat, material and so on.
